Below is a list of our athlete's favorite ranked NBA players (on average), and a couple accolades of said pictures:

  1. LeBron James
    • All-time leading scorer in NBA history
    • 4-time NBA champion
    • Considered by many the "greatest basketball player of all-time

  2. Stephen Curry
    • All-time leader in 3-pointers made in NBA history
    • 4-time NBA champion
    • Considered by many the "greatest shooter of all-time

  3. Ja Morant
    • Not an accolade, but an absolute athletic freak
    • 3-time NBA All-Star

  4. Damian Lilliard
    • Member of the NBA top 75 team
    • Career-high of 71 points
